message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a high-value product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to start with a competitive price of $18000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the market conditions.

I understand you're looking to get a good deal, but I have to consider the value of the product and the market conditions as well. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $16500.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd like to propose a counteroffer of $14500. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product, and I believe this price is fair for both of us.
